data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Bouenza, Republic of Congo today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bouenza, Republic of Congo
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Bouenza, Republic of Congo, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Bouenza that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Bouenza to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Arab people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Arab people know you.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Bouenza, Republic of Congo.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Bouenza. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bouenza, Republic of Congo has a population of 309,100.

We estimate Bouenza has 45,061 people who might know Jesus, 219,179 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 44,861 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 45,061 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

location.name: Bouenza
location.people_groups_list: Pygmy, Bayaka, South Asian, general, Mbosi, Teke, Northern, Arab
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Pygmy, Bayaka (41,000), South Asian, general (190,000), Mbosi (557,000), Teke, Northern (87,000), Arab (1,200)
